summary: The BuildRequest (REQ-24) is to trigger a production publish/deployment with no feature or UI changes. The diff only modifies `project_state.json` and does not provide evidence of any production deployment being triggered or any deployment-related configuration changes. The change also appears to introduce/record product feature details that are out of scope for a publish-only request.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish the currently built version of the application to the production environment with no additional feature or UI changes.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the diff of any production deployment trigger, release configuration, or deployment pipeline change; only `project_state.json` was modified, which does not demonstrate a production publish occurred.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/expanded product feature descriptions/state (e.g., summary and `existing_features` entries) despite the request being publish-only with no feature/UI changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly constrains the work to publishing the current version with no additional feature or UI changes; modifying product feature/state descriptions is not requested and suggests scope beyond a deployment trigger.
